MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Underwood Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 6:10PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair an underground cable fault  affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:08AM on 04 November 2020.
